com.jde.view.hud

Class PseudoFont

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jde.view.hud.PseudoFont

  • public class PseudoFont
extends java.lang.Object
    This PseudoFont class is a set of sprits meant to match a character, and print text
    Author:
    HarZe (David Serrano)
